title: Pets
body: When looking for a pet there is a large amount of decisions that need to be made. What speices do you want? What kind of breed do you want.
instruction: Click on the header to view the species of pets and then click on the secondary headers to explore the breeds of those pets.

_items.title: Dog
_items.body: Dogs or Canis familiaris are very loyal pets. They can very easily be trained by humans to perform tricks or tasks.

_child.childBody: Pugs are usually very short with a wrinkly, short-muzzled face and a curved tail.
Shiba Inu are very independent dogs.
German Shepherds are very large and intelligent dogs. They are often used by the police.

_items.title: Cats
_items.body: Cats or Felis catus are another popular choice as a pet. They are known to be very lazy cats that sleep for many hours of the day.

_child.childBody: Scottish folds have a very 'owl-like' appearance.
The Bengal cat was bred to resemble the looks of more wild cats like Leopards and Ocelots.

_items.title: Alligators
_items.body: Alligators are very dangerous! It's not recommended to keep them as pets!
